author: SeeminglyScience
body:
From the discussion in #7471, the following should work

```powershell
PS> $tuple = [Tuple]::Create(1, 'test')
PS> $tuple[0]
# 1
PS> $tuple[1]
# test
PS> $tuple[0..1]
# 1
# test
PS> $tuple[-1]
# test
```
title: Enable index operations for ITuple implementations
